channel.title: Coldplay on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Coldplay on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron Resigns After Getting Caught on Coldplay Kiss-Cam
item.description: “Our leaders are expected to set the standard in both conduct and accountability, and recently, that standard was not met,” the company said in a statement.

item.title: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron Resigns After Getting Caught on Coldplay Kiss-Cam
item.description: “Our leaders are expected to set the standard in both conduct and accountability, and recently, that standard was not met,” the company said in a statement.

item.title: The Internet Agrees: Coldplay Concert Scandal Was the Funniest Thing to Happen This Week
item.description: Clips from shows like ‘Succession,’ ‘The Sopranos,’ ‘The Simpsons’ and ‘Knight of Cups’ are being deployed to poke fun at the viral moment from the band’s Boston show.

item.title: The Internet Agrees: Coldplay Concert Scandal Was the Funniest Thing to Happen This Week
